org.testng
Interface ITestNGListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAnnotationTransformer, IAnnotationTransformer2, IInvokedMethodListener, IInvokedMethodListener2, IMethodInterceptor, IReporter, ISuiteListener, ITestListener
public interface ITestNGListener

This is a marker interface for all objects that can be passed as a -listener argument.
